trans-unit.source: Contains values that specify the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState" /> of a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 包含值，指定使用者介面自動化項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState" />。

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: On, Off and if supported, Indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 控制項必須循環其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>依此順序： On、 Off，如果支援，未定。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化項目處於不定狀態。

trans-unit.source: The Indeterminate property can be used to indicate whether the user has acted on a control.
trans-unit.target: 不定屬性可以用來指出使用者是否在控制項上對採取動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, a check box can appear checked and dimmed, indicating an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 例如，核取方塊可出現在已檢查以及呈現暗灰色，表示為未決狀態。

trans-unit.source: Creating an indeterminate state is different from disabling the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立不確定的狀態是不同於停用控制項。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, a check box in the indeterminate state can still receive the focus.
trans-unit.target: 因此，核取方塊處於不定狀態仍可以接收焦點。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks an indeterminate control the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate> cycles to its next value.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下不確定控制項<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>循環其下一個值。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is not selected, checked, marked or otherwise activated.
trans-unit.target: 未選取、核取、標記或啟動使用者介面自動化項目。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is selected, checked, marked or otherwise activated.
trans-unit.target: 已選取、核取、標記或啟動使用者介面自動化項目。
